scripts.start:testing: concurrently -n server,client -c bgYellow,bgCyan "npm run start:server-inspect -- --logPath /tmp/testing" "npm run start:client -- -q 2000 -g 100000 -t 2"
scripts.start:500: concurrently -n server,client -c bgYellow,bgCyan "npm run start:server -- --logPath /tmp/so-500" "npm run start:client -- -q 500 -g 100000 -t 2"
scripts.start:1000: concurrently -n server,client -c bgYellow,bgCyan "npm run start:server -- --logPath /tmp/so-1000" "npm run start:client -- -q 1000 -g 100000 -t 2"
scripts.start:2000: concurrently -n server,client -c bgYellow,bgCyan "npm run start:server -- --logPath /tmp/so-2000" "npm run start:client -- -q 2000 -g 100000 -t 2"
scripts.start:5000: concurrently -n server,client -c bgYellow,bgCyan "npm run start:server -- --logPath /tmp/so-5000" "npm run start:client -- -q 5000 -g 100000 -t 2"
